alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Pontotoc; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 4:36PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chickasaw, southeastern Yalobusha, central Calhoun and southwestern Pontotoc Counties through 500 PM CST... At 435 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bruce, or 18 miles southeast of Water Valley, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bruce, Pittsboro, Banner, Randolph, New Houlka, Robbs, Benwood, Bounds, Thorn, Reid, Loyd, Ellard, Pannell, Thelma, Shepherd, Matthews, Skuna, Tyson, Retreat and Sarepta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.
